item.text: At that time Herod the tetrarch heard reports about Jesus,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3816" class="">servants</st>, “<st data-num="3778" class="">This</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st> the <st data-num="910" class="">Baptist</st>. He has been <st data-num="1453" class="">raised</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st>! <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1233">because of</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>, <st data-num="1411">miraculous powers</st> are at <st data-num="1754" class="">work</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.”

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="2264" class="">Herod</st> had <st data-num="2902" class="">arrested</st> <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st>, <st data-num="1210" class="">bound</st> him,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="659" class="">put</st> him <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5438" class="">prison</st> <st data-num="1223">on account of</st> <st data-num="2266" class="">Herodias</st>, <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brother</st> <st data-num="5376">Philip’s</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">wife</st>,

<st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st> had repeatedly <st data-num="3004" class="">told</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “It is <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1832" class="">lawful</st> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> to <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>.”<n id="2" />

Although<n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">Herod</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2309" class="">wanted</st> to <st data-num="615" class="">kill</st> <st data-num="846" class="">John</st>,<n id="3" /> he <st data-num="5399" class="">feared</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> they <st data-num="2192" class="">accepted</st> <st data-num="846" class="">John</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> a <st data-num="4396" class="">prophet</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> on <st data-num="2264" class="">Herod’s</st> <st data-num="1077" class="">birthday</st>, the <st data-num="2364" class="">daughter</st> of <st data-num="2266" class="">Herodias</st> <st data-num="3738" class="">danced</st> <st data-num="1722 3319">before</st> them <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="700" class="">pleased</st> <st data-num="2264" class="">Herod</st>,

<st data-num="3606">so much that</st> he <st data-num="3670" class="">promised</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3326">with</st> an <st data-num="3727" class="">oath</st> to <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whatever</st> she <st data-num="154" class="">asked</st>.

<st data-num="4264" class="">Instructed</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="3384" class="">mother</st>, she <st data-num="5346" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="1325">Give</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> the <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st> of <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st> the <st data-num="910" class="">Baptist</st> <st data-num="5602" class="">here</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> a <st data-num="4094" class="">platter</st>.”

Although it <st data-num="3076" class="">grieved</st> the <st data-num="935" class="">king</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1223">because of</st> his <st data-num="3727" class="">oath</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4873">dinner guests</st> he <st data-num="2753" class="">commanded</st> it to be <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="3992" class="">sent</st> and had <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st> <st data-num="607" class="">beheaded</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="5438" class="">prison</st>.

<st data-num="846" class="">His</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st> was <st data-num="5342" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> a <st data-num="4094" class="">platter</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> to the <st data-num="2877" class="">girl</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> she <st data-num="5342" class="">brought</st> it to <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="3384" class="">mother</st>.
Then John’s disciples came and took the body and buried it and went and told Jesus.
Now when Jesus heard this he went away from there privately in a boat to an isolated place. But when the crowd heard about it, they followed him on foot from the towns.

As he <st data-num="1831">got out</st> he <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> the <st data-num="4183" class="">large</st> <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he had <st data-num="4697" class="">compassion</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2323" class="">healed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="732" class="">sick</st>.

When <st data-num="3798" class="">evening</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">arrived</st>, his <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="4334" class="">came</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “This <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> an <st data-num="2048" class="">isolated</st> <st data-num="5117" class="">place</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="5610" class="">hour</st> is <st data-num="2235" class="">already</st> <st data-num="3928" class="">late</st>. <st data-num="630" class="">Send</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowds</st> <st data-num="630">away</st> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> they can <st data-num="565" class="">go</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="2968" class="">villages</st> and <st data-num="59" class="">buy</st> <st data-num="1033" class="">food</st> for <st data-num="1438" class="">themselves</st>.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3588">he</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004">replied</st>, “They <st data-num="3756 2192">don’t</st> <st data-num="5532" class="">need</st> to <st data-num="565" class="">go</st>. <st data-num="4771" class="">You</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> something to <st data-num="5315" class="">eat</st>.”

<st data-num="3588">They</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “We <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="5602" class="">here</st> <st data-num="3756 1508">only</st> <st data-num="4002" class="">five</st> <st data-num="740" class="">loaves</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="2486" class="">fish</st>.”
“<st data-num="5342">Bring</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="5602" class="">here</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>,” he <st data-num="3004">replied</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="2753" class="">instructed</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowds</st> to <st data-num="347">sit down</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="5528" class="">grass</st>. He <st data-num="2983" class="">took</st> the <st data-num="4002" class="">five</st> <st data-num="740" class="">loaves</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="2486" class="">fish</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="308" class="">looking up</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> he <st data-num="2127">gave thanks</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2806" class="">broke</st> the <st data-num="740" class="">loaves</st>. He <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="740">them</st> to the <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3101" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1161">in turn</st> gave them to the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowds</st>.<n id="3" />

They <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="5315" class="">ate</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> were <st data-num="5526" class="">satisfied</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="142" class="">picked up</st> the <st data-num="2801" class="">broken pieces</st> <st data-num="4052">left over</st>, <st data-num="1427" class="">12</st> <st data-num="2894" class="">baskets</st> <st data-num="4134" class="">full</st>.
Not counting women and children, there were about 5,000 men who ate.
Immediately Jesus made the disciples get into the boat and go ahead of him to the other side, while he dispersed the crowds.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> after he <st data-num="630" class="">sent</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowds</st> <st data-num="630">away</st>, he <st data-num="305">went up</st> the <st data-num="3735" class="">mountain</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">by</st> <st data-num="2398" class="">himself</st> to <st data-num="4336" class="">pray</st>. When <st data-num="3798" class="">evening</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">came</st>, he <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st> <st data-num="3441" class="">alone</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Meanwhile</st> the <st data-num="4143" class="">boat</st>, <st data-num="2235" class="">already</st> <st data-num="4712 4183">far</st> <st data-num="575">from</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">land</st>,<n id="1" /> was <st data-num="568" class="">taking</st> a <st data-num="928" class="">beating</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="2949" class="">waves</st> <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> the <st data-num="417" class="">wind</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1727" class="">against</st> it.

As the <st data-num="3571" class="">night</st> was <st data-num="5067" class="">ending</st>,<n id="1" /> Jesus <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="4043" class="">walking</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="2281" class="">sea</st>.<n id="2" />

When<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="4043" class="">walking</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="2281" class="">water</st><n id="2" /> they were <st data-num="5015" class="">terrified</st> and <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="1510">It’s</st> a <st data-num="5326" class="">ghost</st>!” <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2896">cried out</st> <st data-num="575" class="">with</st> <st data-num="5401" class="">fear</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2117" class="">immediately</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2980" class="">spoke</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them:</st><n id="2" /> “<st data-num="2293">Have courage</st>! It <st data-num="1510">is</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st>. Do <st data-num="3361">not</st> be <st data-num="5399" class="">afraid</st>.”

<st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="2962">Lord</st>, <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> it <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="2753" class="">order</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> to <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st>.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> <st data-num="3588">he</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="2064" class="">Come</st>.” <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="2597" class="">got</st> <st data-num="575">out of</st> the <st data-num="4143" class="">boat</st>, <st data-num="4043" class="">walked</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">toward</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> when he <st data-num="991" class="">saw</st> the <st data-num="2478">strong</st> <st data-num="417" class="">wind</st> he became <st data-num="5399" class="">afraid</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="756" class="">starting</st> to <st data-num="2670" class="">sink</st>, he <st data-num="2896">cried out</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="2962">Lord</st>, <st data-num="4982" class="">save</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>!”

<st data-num="2112" class="">Immediately</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="1614">reached out</st> his <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st> and <st data-num="1949" class="">caught</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “You of <st data-num="3640">little faith</st>, <st data-num="5101" class="">why</st> did you <st data-num="1365" class="">doubt</st>?”

When <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> <st data-num="305">went up</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="4143" class="">boat</st>, the <st data-num="417" class="">wind</st> <st data-num="2869" class="">ceased</st>.
Then those who were in the boat worshiped him, saying, “Truly you are the Son of God.”
After they had crossed over, they came to land at Gennesaret.

When the <st data-num="435" class="">people</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5117" class="">there</st> <st data-num="1921" class="">recognized</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, they <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> word <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="4066">surrounding area</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="4374" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> their <st data-num="2560" class="">sick</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.
They begged him if they could only touch the edge of his cloak, and all who touched it were healed.
